description: This file defines an abstract class 'BaseMockDevice' that implements the 'MockDevice' interface. It provides basic properties such as name, UUID, and online status, along with getter and setter methods for these attributes. It serves as a base class for mock device implementations in testing or simulation contexts.

classes.name: BaseMockDevice
classes.description: An abstract class providing a base implementation of the MockDevice interface, encapsulating common device attributes and behaviors.

methods.name: BaseMockDevice
methods.description: Constructor initializing the device with a name and UUID.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the device.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the device.

methods.name: isOnline
methods.description: Indicates whether the device is currently online.

methods.name: setOnline
methods.description: Sets the online status of the device.
